import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useScrollPosition } from '@n8tb1t/use-scroll-position' const Nav = ({}) => { const [hideOnScroll, setHideOnScroll] = useState({ navSticky: false }) const {navSticky} = hideOnScroll useScrollPosition(({ prevPos, currPos }) => { currPos.y > 5 ? setHideOnScroll({...hideOnScroll, navSticky: true}) : setHideOnScroll({...hideOnScroll, navSticky: false}) }, [hideOnScroll]) return (
SPM Analyzer
Home
Features
Gallery
SPM Estimator
Contact
Download
) } export default Nav
